Trade/Device Name(s): Thermo Scientific CEDIA Opiate OFT Assay
Submitter Information: Thermo Fisher Scientific, Clinical Diagnostic Division
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Thermo Scientific CEDIA Opiate OFT Assay for qualitative determination of opiates in oral fluid using enzyme immunoassay technology
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative determination of opiates in human oral fluid at a cutoff concentration of 30 ng/mL, collected exclusively with Oral-Eze Saliva Collection System, for clinical laboratory use only; provides preliminary analytical results requiring confirmatory testing
